channel.title: CVE Feed for keystonejs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for keystonejs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-34247|2024-08-02T16:01:54.349Z -- keystonejs -- keystone
item.description: Keystone is a content management system for Node.JS. There is an open redirect in the `@keystone-6/auth` package versions 7.0.0 and prior, where the redirect leading `/` filter can be bypassed. Users may be redirected to domains other than the relative host, thereby it might be used by attackers to re-direct users to an unexpected location. To mitigate this issue, one may apply a patch from pull request 8626 or avoid using the `@keystone-6/auth` package.
